"Seasonal Events":
"\"Seasonal Events\" are special events that only last for a limited time.

During these events, the map and the appearance of some enemies will change.

In addition, the ARKS Logistical Support Staff member, Xitrae, appears in all ARKS bases to act as a guide."

"During this Seasonal Event, there will be additional Event-related Daily/Weekly Tasks.

You can learn more about Seasonal Events by talking to Xitrae and selecting \"Ask about Seasonal Events\"."

"In addition, two new Gathering Materials will appear throught all regions: Randomite and Annivartichoke.

These Gathering Materials can be found with your Mag's Active Sonar function."

"Also, during this Seasonal Event, you can obtain NGS 1st Anniversary Item Tickets from the Seasonal Points Shop and as Task rewards.

These Tickets can be traded for various pieces of armor by talking to Xitrae and selecting Ticket Exchange."
